settings.caption: compact design
settings.heading: Efficient Cleaning, Reduced Fatigue
settings.text: The Scrubo RideClean 26 ride-on floor scrubber is designed to reduce strain and fatigue, offering operators a comfortable alternative to walking long distances behind a traditional scrubber. Ideal for maximizing efficiency, this machine is both economical and highly effective over extended use, making it a valuable investment for long-term cleaning needs. With its compact and maneuverable design, the Scrubo RideClean 26 easily navigates narrow aisles and tight spaces while still delivering powerful cleaning performance across large areas. Simple to operate, it helps maintain operator energy and productivity throughout the entire cleaning process.

settings.caption: Built To Last
settings.heading: Simple and Reliable Control Panel
settings.text: Deliver consistent results with the easy-to-operate and maintain floor scrubber Scrubo Pristine 16. Help lower your labor costs and improve cleaning performance with the high RPM 500w brush motor.Â
